nodes.text: R5-X3 was an R5-series astromech droid operating thirty years after the Battle of Endor. It served with the Resistance during their conflict with the First Order.

R5-X3 was released as an action figure in a Disney Parks exclusive set in 2015. The package text suggests he is "featured in the new film Star Wars: The Force Awakens." It can be seen inside the astromech socket of a T-70 X-wing opposite the Millennium Falcon. The pilot that R5-X3 co-piloted with is unknown.
